Sector-10, Dwarka, Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn: 15.7.2008 POLCY MATIERS IECHNCAL (13/2008) (Decision taken on Admn.'s File No.11041/230/2007-Admn-) Sub: Evolving a procedure to check Ihe authenticity of documents submiitted by the consultants There have been instances  in the past  where some of the consultants while submitting bids for   preparation of Detailed Project   Reports (DPR) Or for   Supervision Consultancy of Civil Works have furnished   incorrect inflated bio-data of some personnel with a view to improve their technical score_ Even though age and qualification certificates are now being insisted in such submissions,  it is very  difficult to verify Ihe credentials with respect to experience since the concerned personnel might have worked in different organizations projects in India or any where in the world. This issue has been deliberated in the 221d Weekly Meeting of Chairman and Members held on 4.6.2008 and the following decisions were taken: (a) Bio-data of professionals of the selected bids for DPR preparation, Supervision Consultancy of Civil Works and Independent Consultancy for BOT Projects be hosted on the website for information of all concerned. The" concerned   agencies (supervision consultants and design consultants) will be liable for any incorrect information. This requirement will also be included in the RFQ document for projects to be bid henceforth: (b) To write to preceding two employers for verification of credentials regarding Team Leaders; Senior Highway Engineers and Bridge Engineers for all selected bids for DPR, Supervision Consultancy works and of Independent Consultant for BOT projects. 2 This will be reviewed after six months. sJo+ (V.K.
